Name: Ventris Crusader Edition Light Blue / Grey
Description: The Ventris is a sleek jumpsuit that mixes several rip and stain resistant polymer fabrics for a dynamic design. It also features a half-zip front and adjustable belt to ensure an ideal fit while the soft inner lining makes it an ideal choice for all day wear. The special Crusader Edition was made to be worn by employees of the company and features the sword and C logo on the front.
